Reviews.Title: “Authentic and good value for money”
Reviews.Author: tumper
Reviews.Content: daughter stayed february loved iti chose authentic easy walking distance everythingit homely friendly speak englishspanish portuguese suprised communicate languages breakfasts abundant flower marketthe rembrant museumthe van gogh tussauds shops 30 mins easy walking distance lovely oom 1st floor overlooking canal bed quiet warm feb dissapointment bathroom tiny bit dark shower loo soon afford friends mine spain gone ther agree value money

Reviews.Title: “Traditional, central, obliging”
Reviews.Author: d_jackman
Reviews.Content: charming 4night stay 15 minutes walk central station beside quiet canal singel little traffic 3 4 minutes dam square third floor front lovely view ensuite adequate comfortable clean tiny ensuite newly installed spotless decent shower 3 flights steep stairs limit latter stairs didnt bother lift stay ibis breakfast fine plenty bread cereals boiled eggs ham cheese etc coffee machine grind cup fresh receptionist bruno friendly helpful checking restaurants etc google phoning check availability prices slightly competing stay recommend hotel central base exploring amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Very quiet yet central hotel”
Reviews.Author: dabullar
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel twice separate occasions night amsterdam booked easy walk central station bags heavy checking spoke fluent english helpful map booked rest week hotels decided extend stay amsterdam night chose return night stay fairly typical amsterdam hotels window looked canal road completely quiet night bathroom similar bathroom rv essentials poor water pressure spotlessly clean return visit placed bigger decent sized bathroom excellent shower breakfast delicious little standard dutch breakfasts provided hotels allowed serve yourself buffet kept stocked fresh coffee highly recommend hotel looking amsterdam accommodations price range

Reviews.Content: hotel located center amsterdam beautiful calm channel breakfast average bit especially bath completely hand beds little hard personnel nice total am satisfied hotel imagine stay time

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights fans 3rd floor view paid extra extended vacation lots luggage 3 flights steep narrow stairs rv bathroom door brush teeth breakfast ok plus jay counter super close local attractions hotel return
